question: Who is the  author of the book "Kashi: Secret of the Black Temple"?
explanation: The third and final book of Vineet Bajpai\'s Harappa trilogy \"Kashi: Secret of the Black Temple\" has recently launched in New Delhi. The book tells an intriguing story of a lost civilisation. The three books in the series combine mythology, history, fantasy, crime and the modern-day thriller element. The first two books are \"Harappa: Curse of the Blood River\" and \"Pralay: The Great Deluge\". Bajpai is the founder and chairman of the Magnon Group, a digital and advertising agency.
